mapper.select: select * from ( select bno, title, hit, to_char(time_posted,'YYYY.MM.DD HH:mm:ss') as time_posted, id, addr,bcontent, row_number() over(order by bno desc) as rnum from G_BOARD) where rnum between #{startRowNumber} and #{endRowNumber}
INSERT INTO G_BOARD(BNO, ID, TITLE, BCONTENT, ADDR, TIME_POSTED, HIT) VALUES(#{bno}, #{id}, #{title}, #{bcontent}, #{addr}, sysdate, 0)
INSERT INTO G_PRODUCT(BNO, PNO, PTITLE, KIND, PCONTENT) VALUES(#{bno}, #{pno}, #{ptitle}, #{kind}, #{pcontent})
